edited_stories.edited_story_text: It was your typical 4th of July celebration. The adults and children gathered together, enjoying a variety of activities throughout the day. The kids were playing in the pool while the adults congregated with each other about recent events. Through it all, it was rather pleasant having the family together again and seeing everyone enjoying themselves.
